mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex sex, u.dept_id deptId, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.description, u.user_type userType, u.avatar, u.theme, u.is_tab isTab, d.dept_name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.ROLE_NAME) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.username
mapper.update: update t_user set auth_status = #{authStatus},modify_time=NOW() where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN user_type = '0' THEN '企业用户' WHEN user_type = '1' THEN '自由职业者' WHEN user_type = '2' THEN '系统用户' WHEN user_type is null or user_type = '' THEN '无类型' END 'name', COUNT(1) 'y' FROM t_user GROUP BY user_type
select * from t_user u left join t_dept d on u.dept_id = d.dept_id where dept_name = #{name}
select * from t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur on u.user_id = ur.user_id where ur.role_id = #{id}
